sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The history of magick by way of apology, for all the wise men who have unjustly been reputed magicians, from the Creation, to the present age. / Written in French, by G. Naudæus late library-keeper to Cardinal Mazarin. Englished by J. Davies. Apologie pour tous les grands personnages qui ont esté faussement soupçonnez de magie. English Naudé, Gabriel, 1600-1653. Davies, John, 1625-1693.
[16], 306 p.
Printed for John Streater, and are to be sold by the book-sellers of London, [London] : 1657.
A translation of: Apologie pour tous les grands personnages qui ont esté faussement soupçonnez de magie. Annotation on Thomason copy: "July 3d". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

Printed for John Streater, and are to be sold by the book-sellers of London, [London] : 1657.
